trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som behandler den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> method just before adding a control to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>denne hendelsen oppstår ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A>metoden like før du legger til en kontroll en webdeler sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>

trans-unit.source: This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gir mulighet til å avbryte prosessen før den er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event is called after a control has been added to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>hendelsen kalles når en kontroll som er lagt til en webdeler sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartAddingEventHandler delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som er angitt i WebPartAddingEventHandler representanten kalles når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartAdding` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Siden utviklere kan levere egendefinerte behandlingsprogrammer for hendelsen ved å legge til den `OnWebPartAdding` attributt til den `<asp:webpartmanager>` element i en side, og tilordne en egendefinert navn for attributtet.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Et egendefinert behandlingsprogram kan også tilordnes programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du tilordner programmatisk hendelsesbehandling [NIB: slik: koble denne hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet metoder på hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
